questions.question_text:
You need to train creative designers to create emails and email templates in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys. To help ensure that the email design is consistent across various devices and email software, you explain the advanced inbox preview feature through Litmus.com.

You need the creative designers to be aware of attributes that apply to this feature.

Which two attributes should you convey to the creative designers? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.A: Once the monthly preview quota has been used, the previews can be upgraded for the entire organization.
choices.D: Once the monthly preview quota has been used, the previews can be upgraded for individual user accounts.
choices.C: Once the creative designers unlock a preview, the preview gets locked again after each change to the design or properties.
choices.B: Once the creative designers unlock a preview, the preview remains unlocked after each change to the design or properties.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
After your organization has used all the available previews for the month, each user must set up their own Litmus account if they want to create additional previews. Personal Litmus quotas apply to individual users, not to the entire organization

Each time you unlock a preview, you'll use one preview from either your organization's or your personal quota. The unlocked preview remains available for viewing until you change the design or the Properties (dynamic text) settings, at which time all existing previews will no longer be valid and will be shown as locked again
